profile.description: Dynamic web developer skilled at developing solutions, able to work independently or as a team with perfect work ethics and propose new ideas for team's benefit. Enthusiastic to learn and implement any new skills in a given task

experience.first-job-description: Web development of official website of the company using MEAN stack
experience.second-job-description: Designed and developed a SPA using HTML, CSS3, Bootstrap, JavaScript, Angular

projects.first-project-description:
Simple ToDo app to orginise tasks to maintain our day-to-day tasks or list everything that we have to do, with the most important tasks at the top of the list, and the least important tasks at the bottom. It is helpful in planning our daily schedules.
Creating the Components.
Editing TodoForm Component
Editing TodoList Component
Editing the Todo Component
Using Hooks (State, Effect, Context, Customs)
